meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.0.CR1 released!
meta.summary:
The first candidate release of the upcoming Vert.x 4.2 has just been released. We
  consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.0 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.2.0 has just been released. It comes with a set of new exciting features!

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.5 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.5 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 CR1 released!
meta.summary: The first release candidate of the upcoming Vert.x 4 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4.2
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4.2, including Java 17 support, Vert.x Oracle Client and more.
